CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1965, pg. 7 reads: "King and Queen of the D.I.'s Mardi Gras Ball were chosen for their community as well as foreign activities. The king was Dr. H. Raymond Primas and the queen was Mrs. Edward Hale. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Dr. H. Raymond Primas and Barbara Hale, wearing king and queen costumes, seated on high backed upholstered chairs, woman wearing dark satin costume with light colored trim placing crown on Barbara Hale's head, gathered in Hilton Hotel for D.I.'s Mardi Gras Ball
